title: Tom Steven
text: Tom Steven (born 5 September 1954) is a retired Scottish <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who played in the <a href="Scottish%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Berwick%20Rangers%20F.C.">Berwick Rangers</a>, <a href="Forfar%20Athletic%20F.C.">Forfar Athletic</a>, <a href="East%20Fife%20F.C.">East Fife</a>, <a href="Hamilton%20Academical%20F.C.">Hamilton Academical</a> and <a href="Hibernian%20F.C.">Hibernian</a>. After his retirement as a player, he managed <a href="Cowdenbeath%20F.C.">Cowdenbeath</a> and <a href="Edinburgh%20City%20F.C.">Edinburgh City</a>.
